author: Sergio Soares
comment: I was looking for an app compatible with Zephyr heart rate belt and also with alarms for heart rate zone and training plans (like intervals based on heart rate) . This was the only one I could find. Endomondo has it but only in premium mode. The app worked nicely and has a simple and easy to use UI. It also connects with Google fit, which is great. Thank you very much for this app.
title: Simple and great.

author: Kerryn Griffis
comment: Not compatible with magellan heart rate monitor

reply.author: Gabriel Weis
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback. To fix the problem, we need some more information. May you send the following information to info.mybeatfit@agiledev.de.
- the exact Magellan Heart rate monitor
- do you use ANT+ or Bluetooth
- if you use ANT+, supports your smartphone ANT+ or do you use an external ANT+ sensor via OTG

Thanx & have a nice day ;-)

title: Looks ok but not compatible

author: Rafael Alejandro Escoto Hernández
comment: They claim to connect with ant+ but cant sync with scotsche+

reply.author: Gabriel Weis
reply.content:
Does your phone support ANT+ or have you connected an ANT+ dongle?

Thx for your Feedback

title: No scotsche+

author: Android Basis A
comment: Only polar? And zephyr? Why not other Bluetooth HR monitors like smart watches? Common man, get with the times

reply.author: Gabriel Weis
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback. Which smart watch do you use?

title: Needs more support

author: Velo Fan
comment: Works perfectly with my Polar Heart belt.
title: Great app
